text: Aur tum mein say jiss kissi ko aazad musalman aurton say nikkah kerney ki poori wusâ€™at-o-taqat na ho to woh musalman londiyon say jin kay tum maalik ho (apna nikkah ker ley) Allah tumharay aemaal ko ba khoobi janney wala hai tum sab aapas mein aik hi to ho iss liye unn kay maalikon ki ijazat say unn say nikkah kerlo aur qaeeday kay mutabiq unn kay mehar unn ko do woh pak daaman hon na kay aelaaniya bad kaari kerney waliyan na khufia aashnaee kerney waliyan pus jab yeh londiyan nikkah mein aajayen phir agar woh bey hayaee ka kaam keren to unhen aadhi saza hai uss saza say jo aazad aurton ki hai. Kaneezon say nikkah ka yeh hukum tum mein say unn logon kay liye hai jinhen gunah aur takleef ka andesha ho aur tumhara zabt kerna boht behtar hai aur Allah Taalaa bara bakshney wala aur bari rehmat wala hai
